text: Jani thoraa ye, niscaya prthiraira jirana khela-dhemali, kraira-kautuka, saundarya, arau tomalokara parasparaika gaurara-ahankara, dhana-sampada arau santana-santatita praacurya labhara pratiyogitara bahirae ana eko nahaya. Iyara udaharana haiche barasunara darae, yara dbaraa utpanna sasya-sambharae krsakasakalaka anandita karae, tara pichata se'ibora suka'i yaya, tetiya tumi se'iboraka haladhiya baranata dekhibalai poraa, arasesata se'ibora khera-kutata parainata haya; arau akhiraatata ache kathina sasti arau allahara magaphiraata o santusti; arau prthiraira jirana prataranara bahirae ana eko nahaya
